game.name: Kingdom Savannah
game.shortDescription: Your cozy expedition awaits! Get ready to set up camp and wander the beautiful landscape, helping animals find their way home during your creature-collecting sandbox adventure. Craft useful items, build your base, there’s so much to do here.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Your cozy expedition awaits! Get ready to set up camp and wander the beautiful landscape, helping animals find their way home during your creature-collecting sandbox adventure. Craft useful items, build your base, there’s so much to do here.
